name: Generate import-graph.json for Orphaned File Analysis
description: Investigate and locate the script responsible for generating `import-graph.json` (likely within `scripts/auditing/` or `scripts/analysis/`). Execute the script to create the required `import-graph.json` file needed as input for `scripts/auditing/find_orphaned_files.py` (Task ORPHANED-FILE-SWEEP-001).
notes: Prerequisite for task ORPHANED-FILE-SWEEP-001. Successfully found script `scripts/auditing/generate_import_graph.py`, corrected its path logic, and executed it to create `import-graph.json`.

name: Run find_orphaned_files.py and Log Results
description: Use scripts/auditing/find_orphaned_files.py to list unreferenced modules. Output to docs/analysis/orphans.md. Mark anything safe to delete.
notes: Successfully ran find_orphaned_files.py after generating prerequisite import-graph.json. Output saved to docs/analysis/orphans.md. Identified 170 potentially orphaned files requiring review.
result_summary: Generated list of 170 potentially orphaned files in docs/analysis/orphans.md.
